publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3294# Mr Mike Rumbles: Safety on the A90—That the Parliament notes with concern the increase in serious accidents on the A90 between Laurencekirk and Aberdeen; congratulates the Scottish Executive on its commitment to making Scotland’s roads safer; welcomes its promise to introduce an Accident Investigation and Prevention Scheme at the Laurencekirk/Marykirk junction as an important first step, and believes that the Executive should introduce similar safety schemes at other junctions along this stretch of road.
S1M-3294# Safety on the A90 (lodged on 30 July 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-3294# Safety on the A90 (lodged on 30 July 2002) Donald Gorrie*
